metadata.name: Euphoria
metadata.description:
Fly as high as your wings are capable of. There is nothing in this life that can stop you from touching the sky except your own will. It’s all about perspective, courage and faith.

This image was shot at Pushkar, India in 2015 during the camel fair. This is a very rare image of a kind as hot air balloons are not allowed there to fly there since 2015.

THE LICENCE
Extended Editorial: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.

Artist name: Dr Vimal Hemani
Subject: Landscape
Location: Pushkar, India
Edition: 1/1
Dimension: 3648 x 5472
